meanings.definition: Not subjected to physical or mental pressure or stress.
meanings.sent1: She felt unstrained and relaxed after a long walk in the park.
meanings.sent2: The unstrained smile on his face showed his genuine happiness.
meanings.sent3: The unstrained cat lazily stretched out in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her unstrained laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The unstrained breeze gently rustled the leaves, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The unstrained juice still had bits of fruit in it.
meanings.sent2: He preferred the unstrained taste of natural spring water.
meanings.sent3: The unstrained soup had a chunky texture that surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her unstrained honesty was refreshing in a world of deceit.
meanings.sent5: The unstrained milk had a creamy richness that delighted the taste buds.

meanings.sent1: Her unstrained acting made the character feel real and relatable.
meanings.sent2: The unstrained conversation flowed naturally between them.
meanings.sent3: His unstrained smile lit up the room with genuine warmth.
meanings.sent4: The unstrained melody of the song touched the hearts of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The unstrained friendship between them was evident in their easy laughter.
